docs: AvenirEdge offers beginner to advanced courses in AI, machine learning, data science, and prompt engineering. Each course includes hands-on projects, quizzes, and mentorship support. Popular tracks include: - AI Foundations - Building with LLMs - Deploying ML Models - Prompt Engineering for Chatbots

Q: What is AvenirEdge? A: AvenirEdge is a learning platform focused on AI and emerging technologies. Q: Do I need coding experience? A: No. Many beginner courses are designed for non-coders. Q: How do I get mentorship? A: Mentorship is available through Slack and weekly live sessions.
